ComicInfo.Series: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds - The Scorpius Run
ComicInfo.Summary: The Scorpius Run [Part 2]: The Enterprise is forced to compete in a starship race against alien ships through a dangerous sector of space, with some crew members serving on the competing ships. One of the obstacles they face is a race of carnivorous space creatures who feed on starships.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-17 23:02:18. [CVDB1021498] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:09:23. [Issue ID 2571564]

Commander Una Chin-Riley [Number One],Captain Christopher Pike,Zephyx,Ensign Nyota Uhura,unnamed Rovoks,the Oscillans,Nurse Christine Chapel,Lt. Sam Kirk,unnamed Karogies
